tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I have been going to Dr. Neeraja Patcha since my baby was born and all vaccinations has been done here.. she is very friendly and the environment of the hospital is clean and most mportantly limited people and limited appointments not crowded at all as in other places..I feel it's safe place during these pandemic situation.. I am writing this review after 1 year and 2 months and highly recommend Dr. Neeraja if you looking for pediatrician for your child... Also the staffs are very supportive to book appointments  or any questions to doctor  and get the response quickly and  you can walk out in 30 to 40 mins. no long waits ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She makes children feel happy by talking sweetly and giving stickers....she hears all the health issues slowly and gives us a positive attitude towards our kids health...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Been looking for a Gud pediatrician and mglad tht i found the right person.Went to shwo my 7month old son since he was having diahrea and i was very happy with the treatment.She takes time n listens and guides with lot of patience n clarity..As a first time mom i was lil directionless about baby weaning bt Dr gave me a timetable n gv complete assurance abt weaning process..Its a very personalised approach n m sure u wud love to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: Have been visiting the doctor for past 5 yrs for my kids . She has been always available for any doubts, problem and treatments and has been very friendly. I have always been very satisfied with all my visits. She has always addressed all queries with patience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor is a very friendly person and she makes the child comfortable before any check up by randomly interacting with them and welcomes us with a warm smile on her face everytime She is very patient in explaining things to parents .. She remembers all her patients records and so personally connected with every parent and kid .. 100% recommended doctor‚Ä¶

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Went there for a general check up and to clarify few doubts on my baby's health. She took her time and explained in detail and provided enough knowledge on what is happening to my baby. Hospital has Nice atmosphere. After explaining for such a long time. I was worried that about the bill. But after seeing the bill I was happy that it was only 300 rupees.  I would surely recommend for everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: She is great. My son has been treated right from 2.5months and now he is 3.5yrs old. She generally don't give medicine until it is necessary. She patiently listen all the queries of the parents regarding kid and give right suggestion and treatment. Overall very happy with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

review: We are very much pleased with the hospitality provided during our visit. We were on the right time and the wait time is less. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
IT'S NOT A MERE HOSPITAL, ITS AN EXPERIENCE!!

A very good child care hospital in city! I like the ambience and the way of the staff receive patients! The quality time spent by Dr. Neeraja is awesome, have not seen such kind of individual attention to child care!! Fully satisfied with the amenities, facility and service..  wish this hospital to be in Annanagar, near to Indeco Hospital...!!.Not yet found any child hospital like this... The way Dr. Neeraja explained to our long list query was marvellous.. she answered all our queries and doubts patiently.  Thanks to Dr. Neeraja and team...üëçüëçüëç
